rooms.description: A welcoming entrance space with a small sitting area and coat closet.

Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining an open dining area integrated into the living space. Designed according to Vastu guidelines by placing it in the southeast section for positive energy.
Open-concept layout combining living, dining, and study areas. Incorporates ample natural light with large windows facing east or north as per Vastu.
Multipurpose studio space serving as a bedroom and work area, located in the southwest quadrant ensuring calm energy.
Functional bathroom with necessary fixtures and natural lighting. Placed near the kitchen per Vastu to maintain balance.
A dedicated entertainment space with soundproofing, designed with south-west or west orientation for immersive experience as per Vastu recommendations.
rooms.vastu: Southwest placement recommended for energy balance.

openings.description: Sturdy door designed to welcome guests, aligned with the north-east side of the entrance hall.
Strategically placed windows in living and bedroom areas for natural light. Ensure east or north facing for best energy flow.
Door leading to the expansive garden area, enhancing connectivity with nature.

garden.description: A spacious outdoor garden featuring greenery, seating areas, and water features. Designed following Vastu principles by aligning its entrance to the east for auspicious energy.
